itemDescription: English poet, author and secular humanist activist and editor

wikipedia_page.main: Kit Mouat (1 March 1920 – 3 September 1986 ) was an English poet, author and secular humanist activist and editor.  She worked and wrote under the pseudonym "Kit Mouat" to protect her diplomat husband.  She also used the names Jane MacKay and Jean MacKay, and Catharine Lund.
